name: Viola tricolor

Head: Heavy, pressing-outward pain
Eczema of scalp, with swollen glands
Face hot and sweating after eating
Skin: Eruptions, particularly over face and head, with burning, itching; worse at night
Thick scabs, which crack and exude a tenacious yellow pus
WORSE, winter; eleven AM Compare: LYCOP
Throat: Much phlegm, causing hawking; worse in the air
Male: Swelling of prepuce, burning in glans

details: The principal uses of this remedy are for eczema in childhood and nocturnal emission accompanied by very vivid dreams.
